The symbolism $ \lfloor x\rfloor$ denotes the largest integer not exceeding $ x$. For example. $ \lfloor3\rfloor=3$, and $ \lfloor 9/2\rfloor=4$. Compute\\
\[ \lfloor\sqrt1\rfloor+\lfloor\sqrt2\rfloor+\lfloor\sqrt3\rfloor+\cdots+\lfloor\sqrt{16}\rfloor.
\]$ \textbf{(A)}\ 35 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 38 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 40 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 42 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 136$
